channel.title: Wrong place? Need people for development team :p
channel.description:
Hi guys, currently, me and Epic Ancient are remaking RS from 2005. it will be EXACTLY like rs, no codes, a good economy, none of the bad updates.
So, this is a big task for two people, and so we need help.
Currently there is
0mg Noob Epic Ancient --Knova [kite] (Helping)-- - - There are two more spaces at the mo. You must have teamviewer, The server base is Devolution 2.7
We are new [except kite] to devo so it would help alot if you had some experience to help us all.
If this is in wrong place please tell me and possibly move it to right place. We are aiming to get a development team going, to track updates and progress.
I willpost more info very soon. Thanks! :-)

item.title: Wrong place? Need people for development team :p
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

zane02:

Alrighty then. I can get you all the autospawn with all runescape npcs back in 2005. But they wont have interfaces yet, so were gonna need to add them. [as in they wont talk to you, answer your questions, and such]

That would be great! I have one at the min but it seems to have clones of every npc lol

Read full topic

item.title: Wrong place? Need people for development team :p
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

zane02:

all servers that wanna make it like rs was in 2005 always fail because they never make a webclient, website, and forums. But anyway i wanna be in the team lol even though chances are it wont work out.

I will be getting a website, hopefully a webclient and forums. Just concerntrating on server at the minute though as it’s not officially released.

I’m very passionate about this server, as I know how much fun rs was in 2005.

ok i sound a little weird now but nevermind haha

Read full topic
